Stage 1:
['In', 'hieroglyphs', ',', 'the', 'name', 'Tutankhamun', 'was', 'typically', 'written', 'Amen-tut-ankh', ',', 'because', 'of', 'a', 'scribal', 'custom', 'that', 'placed', 'a', 'divine', 'name', 'at', 'the', 'beginning', 'of', 'a', 'phrase', 'to', 'show', 'appropriate', 'reverence', '.']
In hieroglyphs, the name Tutankhamun was typically written Amen-tut-ankh, because of a scribal custom that placed a divine name at the beginning of a phrase to show appropriate reverence.

Other     experts  ,  however  ,  rejected the     hypothesis  of homozygous sickle cell disease based  on     survival beyond the     age      of       5  and the     location  of the     osteonecrosis  ,  which  is  characteristic  of  Freiberg-Kohler     syndrome rather       than sickle-cell     disease  .

  JJ        NNS    ,      RB     ,    VBD     DT         NN      IN     JJ        JJ    NN     NN    VBN   IN            NN      IN    DT        NN        IN          CD  CC  DT        NN     IN    DT             NN       ,   WDT  VBZ        JJ        IN         NN              NN      RB          IN       JJ            NN    . 
  |          |     |      |      |     |      |          |       |      |         |     |      |      |    |             |       |     |         |         |           |   |   |         |      |     |              |        |    |    |         |         |          |               |       |           |        |             |     |  
Other     experts  ,   however   ,  rejected the     hypothesis  of homozygous  sickle cell disease based  on         survival beyond the       age        of          5  and the     location  of   the       osteonecrosis  ,  which  is  characteristic  of  Freiberg-Kohler     syndrome rather       than sickle-cell     disease  .

Various other diseases  ,  invoked  as possible     explanations  to his          early demise  ,  included Marfan syndrome  ,  Wilson-Turner X-linked mental retardation syndrome  ,  Fröhlich     syndrome  ,  Klinefelter     syndrome  ,  androgen insensitivity syndrome  ,  aromatase excess syndrome  in conjunction   with  sagittal         craniosynostosis syndrome  ,  Antley  -- Bixler     syndrome  or one  of       its       variants  ,  and temporal lobe epilepsy  .

Various  other  diseases  ,  invoked  as possible         explanations  to his           early  demise  ,  included  Marfan syndrome  ,  Wilson-Turner X-linked mental retardation syndrome  ,  Fröhlich         syndrome  ,  Klinefelter         syndrome  ,   androgen insensitivity syndrome  ,  aromatase  excess syndrome  in conjunction   with  sagittal         craniosynostosis syndrome  ,   Antley  -- Bixler         syndrome  or   one    of           its           variants  ,  and temporal   lobe  epilepsy  .

Potential Answer Phrases:

Marfan syndrome, Wilson-Turner X-linked mental retardation syndrome, Fröhlich syndrome, Klinefelter syndrome, androgen insensitivity syndrome, aromatase excess syndrome in conjunction with sagittal craniosynostosis syndrome, Antley -- Bixler syndrome or one of its variants, and temporal lobe epilepsy

 In   late      2013  ,  Egyptologist Dr. Chris Naunton and scientists from the         Cranfield Institute performed  a   `` virtual autopsy  ''  of         Tutankhamun  ,  revealing  a      pattern      of         injuries down  one       side  of Albert   Zink       's body  .

 In historical     terms  ,  Tutankhamun      's significance stems from the     fact that his      reign was close  to the      apogee      of     Egypt  as   a      world power and from his      rejection  of the radical religious innovations introduced  by his  predecessor and father  ,  Akhenaten  .

 In historical         terms  ,  Tutankhamun          's significance stems from the         fact that his          reign was close  to the          apogee          of          Egypt   as   a           world   power  and from   his           rejection    of   the radical religious innovations introduced    by     his   predecessor   and   father  ,  Akhenaten  .

 On      4  November        2007  ,   85     years  to the     day after Howard Carter      's discovery  ,  the 19-year-old pharaoh went  on display  in the 19-year-old pharaoh  's  underground tomb  at     Luxor  ,   when  King Tutankhamun      's mummy was removed from King Tutankhamun  's mummy  's golden sarcophagus  to  a  climate-controll glass box  .

This     development implies that either Neferneferuaten was deposed  in  a      struggle for     power  ,  possibly deprived  of  a      royal burial  -- and buried  as      a      Queen  --  or that she was  Neferneferuaten with  a  different set  of king      's funerary equipment  -- possibly Akhenaten      's own funerary equipment  by King Tutankhamun      's officials since King     Tutankhamun succeeded Neferneferuaten  as     king  .

This     development implies that   either  Neferneferuaten was deposed    in    a          struggle   for            power   ,   possibly deprived    of      a             royal   burial  -- and buried  as            a            Queen  --  or that   she   was  Neferneferuaten with  a  different set  of   king             's   funerary equipment  -- possibly Akhenaten            's     own   funerary equipment  by King Tutankhamun          's officials since    King           Tutankhamun succeeded Neferneferuaten  as           king   .

     |                |            |             |            ______|_________       |    |     ________|____            |    |                     ___|___      |                     ___|________       |       _____|______         |   |     |     ____|_____                |   |     ___|___     |   |                 |                      |    |     ___|___     |         __________|________          |  
     NP               |            NP            |           NP               |     WHNP  |    |             NP          |    |                    NP      |     |                    NP      |    |      |      |            NP       |  WHNP   |    |          NP              |   |    |       NP   |   |                 NP                    WHNP  |    |       NP   |        NP         |        NP        | 
  ___|_______         |       _____|_______      |    _______|__________      |      |    |    |     ________|_____      |    |           _________|___    |     |           _________|___    |    |      |      |      ______|___     |   |     |    |     _____|__________     |   |    |       |    |   |      ___________|_______________       |    |    |       |    |     ___|____      |     ___|____     |  
 DT  JJ     NNS      VBD    NNP   NNP     NNP    ,  NNP     NNP        POS    NN     WP  VBD   IN   DT       JJ   NNS    TO   VB        NNP           POS  NN    IN        NNP           POS  NN  POS     NN     IN   NNP         CD   ,   WP   VBD   IN   DT    JJ    CD  NNS   CC VBD   IN      CD   ,   CC    JJ          NN      NNP    NNP     WP  VBD   IN      CD   ,    CD      NNS    IN   DT       NN   . 
 |   |       |        |      |     |       |     |   |       |          |     |      |    |    |    |        |     |     |    |          |             |   |     |          |             |   |    |      |      |     |          |    |   |     |    |    |     |     |    |    |   |    |       |    |   |     |           |        |      |      |    |    |       |    |    |        |     |    |        |    |  
The last survivors included Lady Evelyn Herbert  ,  Lord Carnarvon      's daughter who  was among the     first people  to enter Neferneferuaten      's tomb after Neferneferuaten      's tomb  's discovery  in November     1922  ,  who  lived for   a  further  57 years and died  in     1980  ,  and American archaeologist J.O. Kinnaman who  died  in     1961  ,    39     years after the     event  .

The last survivors included Lady  Evelyn Herbert  ,    Lord  Carnarvon          's daughter who  was among the          first  people  to enter Neferneferuaten            's     tomb  after Neferneferuaten            's     tomb   's discovery  in November         1922  ,    who   lived   for      a    further    57   years and died    in             1980   ,  and American archaeologist J.O. Kinnaman who  died    in             1961   ,      39           years  after  the         event  .

 In     2004  ,  the     tour  of Tutankhamun     funerary objects entitled Tutankhamen  :  The Golden Hereafter  ,  consisting  of fifty     artifacts from Tutankhamun      's tomb and seventy funerary goods from other 18th Dynasty tombs  ,  began  in Basel      ,   Switzerland and went  on  to many     other countries  ,  including the USA  ,  USSR  ,  Japan  ,  France  ,  Canada  ,  and West Germany  ,   on the second leg  of the     tour  of Tutankhamun     funerary objects  .

 In           2004   ,  the         tour  of Tutankhamun         funerary objects entitled Tutankhamen  :  The  Golden Hereafter  ,  consisting  of fifty         artifacts   from  Tutankhamun            's   tomb   and   seventy funerary goods   from   other    18th  Dynasty tombs  ,  began  in  Basel             ,    Switzerland   and   went  on    to     many           other  countries  ,  including the USA  ,  USSR  ,  Japan    ,    France  ,  Canada  ,  and   West  Germany  ,   on   the    second   leg    of   the           tour    of   Tutankhamun         funerary objects  .

 In           2011   ,  the Bonn exhibition visited Australia for the          first  time  ,  opening  at   the   Egyptian  Museum  in  April    for     its     only  Australian stop before Egypt            's   treasures  returned  to          Cairo   in December         2011  .

the Bonn exhibition included  80     exhibits from the     reigns  of Tutankhamun      's immediate predecessors  in the     Eighteenth dynasty  ,  such  as Hatshepsut  ,  whose trade     policies greatly increased the     wealth  of  that     dynasty and enabled the lavish wealth  of Tutankhamun      's burial artifacts  ,   as  well  as  50 from Tutankhamun      's tomb  .

 NP       NP       |                     NP                |      |           NP                  |         NP             |        NP          |         NP            |           NP      |   |         NP            |           NP      |                       NP                       |    |     |         NP       WHNP  |       NP          |       NP       |        NP       |   |         NP                |     |     |     NP    WHNP    |      |            NP            |        NP      |           NP      |      |              NP            |        NP   | 
 |     ___|___     |        _____________|________         |      |    _______|______________     |    _____|_______       |    ____|_____      |    _____|_______      |           |       |   |    _____|_______      |           |       |     __________________|__________________      |    |     |      ___|____     |    |    ___|_____      |    ___|___     |    ____|___     |   |    _____|_________        |     |     |     |      |      |      |      ______|______       |        |       |       ____|___    |      |        ______|______       |        |    |  
 DT   DT      NN   IN     NNP            JJ      NNS      VBN     IN  DT NNP  CC    NNP     NNP   IN  DT   NNP     NNP     IN NNP        NNP    ,   DT   NNP     NNP    IN         NNPS     ,   CC  DT    JJ      NN    IN          NN      IN   DT      NNP       NNP   CC   NNP     NNP   VBZ   RB    VB    DT  NN   NN  WDT  VBD  DT        NN    IN  DT      CD   :   CD       NN   ,   IN  DT    JJ        NN     VBZ   VBN    IN    NN    WDT    VBD     TO    JJ           NNS     IN      NNS     VBZ     DT       CD  IN    VBG      JJ           NNS     IN      NNS   . 
 |    |       |    |       |             |        |        |      |   |   |   |      |       |    |   |     |       |      |   |          |     |   |     |       |     |           |       |   |   |     |       |     |           |       |    |        |         |    |     |       |     |    |     |     |   |    |    |    |   |         |     |   |       |    |   |        |    |   |   |     |         |       |     |     |     |      |      |      |     |             |      |        |       |      |        |   |      |       |             |      |        |    |  
This the     tour  of Tutankhamun     funerary objects organised  by the Art and Exhibition Hall  of the Federal Republic  of West     Germany  ,  the Supreme Council  of     Antiquities  ,  and the Egyptian Museum  in     cooperation with the Antikenmuseum Basel and Sammlung Ludwig does not include the gold mask that was  a      feature  of the     1972  -- 1979     tour  ,   as the Egyptian government has decided that damage which occurred  to previous     artifacts  on     tours precludes this     one from joining previous     artifacts  on     tours  .

This the     tour  of Tutankhamun         funerary objects organised  by the Art and Exhibition Hall  of the Federal Republic  of   West      Germany  ,  the Supreme Council  of         Antiquities  ,  and the Egyptian Museum  in         cooperation with   the   Antikenmuseum Basel and Sammlung Ludwig does not include the gold mask that was  a      feature  of   the       1972  -- 1979     tour  ,   as the  Egyptian government has decided that  damage  which  occurred  to previous         artifacts  on          tours  precludes this         one from joining previous         artifacts  on          tours   .

Renamed Tutankhamun  :  The Golden King and the Great Pharaohs  ,   A  separate exhibition called Tutankhamun and the      World  of the     Pharaohs toured the  US and Canada from November     2008  to      6  January        2013  .
